sentences.en: "How do you know he's Irish?" —"Sticks out a mile."
sentences.cn: “你是怎么知道他是爱尔兰人的呢？”——“明摆的事嘛。”

sentences.en: "Kathleen" was, as its 1892 subtitle asserted, "An Irish Drama".
sentences.cn: 正如1892年剧本的副标题所强调的，《凯瑟琳》是一部“爱尔兰戏剧”。

sentences.en: Alan doesn't care two hoots about Irish politics.
sentences.cn: 艾伦对爱尔兰政治毫不关心。

sentences.en: Gill speaks in a quiet Irish brogue.
sentences.cn: 吉尔说话带有轻微的爱尔兰口音。

sentences.en: Her Irish accent, after thirty-odd years in London, is undiluted.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦呆了30多年，爱尔兰口音仍很浓重。

sentences.en: I am starting to sense that maybe I and people like me are to blame because it is we, the Irish people, who are paying with our jobs, livelihoods, health care and education.
sentences.cn: 我开始感觉到或许就是我以及像我这样的人，该受责备，因为就是我们，让爱尔兰人民，正在为我们的工作、生活、医疗卫生和教育买单。

sentences.en: It is appropriate that Irish names dominate the list.
sentences.cn: 名单上大部分是爱尔兰名字，这没什么不合适的。

sentences.en: It's so restful to meander along Irish country roads.
sentences.cn: 沿着爱尔兰的乡间小路漫步是多么惬意。

sentences.en: On the other hand, the Irish are also right to be suspicious of intentions in Brussels and Berlin.
sentences.cn: 另一方面，爱尔兰对于柏林和布鲁塞尔的意图持怀疑态度也是有道理的。
她跳起了爱尔兰吉格舞。

sentences.en: The gallery has mounted an exhibition of art by Irish women painters.
sentences.cn: 画廊已举办了一场爱尔兰女画家的作品展。

sentences.en: The Irish Free State came into being in 1922.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰自由邦成立于1922年。

sentences.en: The Irish love a party, the bigger the better.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰人喜欢聚会，规模越大越好。

sentences.en: The round-trip fare to Havana is 550 Irish punts ($673).
sentences.cn: 去哈瓦那的往返票价是550爱尔兰镑（673美元）。

sentences.en: These two buildings typify the rich extremes of Irish architecture.
sentences.cn: 这两座建筑物体现了爱尔兰建筑风格的极致多变。

sentences.en: They were amazed that I was talking in an Irish accent.
sentences.cn: 我说话带爱尔兰口音让他们感到很惊奇。

sentences.en: This book is suffused with Shaw's characteristic wry Irish humour.
sentences.cn: 这本书充满了萧伯纳独特的爱尔兰式幽默与嘲讽。

words.tran_cn: 爱尔兰；爱尔兰人；爱尔兰语

phrases.tran_cn: n. 爱尔兰咖啡（一种鸡尾酒）

trans.tran_cn: 爱尔兰的，爱尔（人[语，文化…）的
trans.tran_en: relating to Ireland or its people

trans.tran_cn: 爱尔兰人(的),爱尔兰语（的）
